message.name: core.invalidField
message.text: This field has an invalid value. $1

message.name: core.invalidComparator
message.text: This is not a valid comparator. $1

message.name: core.invalidEntityList
message.text: This is not a valid list of names. $1

message.name: core.valueRequired
message.text: Value is required. No value is entered.

message.name: core.invalidFromTo
message.text: To value can not be less than the from value.

message.name: core.invalidOtherField
message.text: Value is required for this field because of the value its related field has.

message.name: core.invalidSortOrder
message.text: Sort order shoudl be either asc or desc

message.name: core.invalidBasedOnField
message.text: Value is required for this field because of the value its related field has.

message.name: core.internalError
message.text: We are sorry. There was an internal error because of which your request could not be completed. Issue has been reported to the support team. You may try again after some time.

message.name: core.invalidTableAction
message.text: add, modify, delete and save are the vaid actions.

message.name: core.invalidInputStream
message.text: Serialized data sent by the client is invalid

message.name: core.noService
message.text: Service $1 is not served by this server.

message.name: core.noAccess
message.text: This service is not accessible to you.

message.name: core.noRows
message.text: No rows found maching the requested data

message.name: core.noUpdate
message.text: No data was updated/inserted or deleted

message.name: core.invalidAttachmentKey
message.text: $1 is not a valid attachment key. On success of an upload, server returns a key to that attachment. Client needs to send that key.
